verses.verse: <WH6213>"'You shall make for yourselves no idols,<WH457> neither shall you raise up<WH6965> an engraved image<WH6459> or a pillar,<WH4676> neither shall you place<WH5414> any figured<WH4906> stone<WH68> in your land,<WH776> to bow down<WH7812> to it:<WH3068> for I am Yahweh your God.<WH430>
<WH8104>"'You shall keep my Sabbaths,<WH7676> and have reverence<WH3372> for my sanctuary.<WH4720> I am Yahweh.<WH3068>
<WH3212>"'If you walk in my statutes,<WH2708> and keep<WH8104> my commandments,<WH4687> and do them;<WH6213>

then I will give<WH5414> you your rains<WH1653> in their season,<WH6256> and the land<WH776> shall yield<WH5414> its increase,<WH2981> and the trees<WH6086> of the field<WH7704> shall yield<WH5414> their fruit.<WH6529>

Your threshing<WH1786> shall reach<WH5381> to the vintage,<WH1210> and the vintage<WH1210> shall reach<WH5381> to the sowing time;<WH2233> and you shall eat<WH398> your bread<WH3899> to the full,<WH7648> and dwell<WH3427> in your land<WH776> safely.<WH983>

<WH5414>"'I will give peace<WH7965> in the land,<WH776> and you shall lie down,<WH7901> and no one will make you afraid;<WH2729> and I will remove<WH7673> evil<WH7451> animals<WH2416> out of the land,<WH776> neither shall the sword<WH2719> go<WH5674> through your land.<WH776>
You shall chase<WH7291> your enemies,<WH341> and they shall fall<WH5307> before<WH6440> you by the sword.<WH2719>

Five<WH2568> of you shall chase<WH7291> a hundred,<WH3967> and a hundred<WH3967> of you shall chase<WH7291> ten thousand;<WH7233> and your enemies<WH341> shall fall<WH5307> before<WH6440> you by the sword.<WH2719>
<WH6437>"'I will have respect for you,<WH6509> and make you fruitful, and multiply<WH7235> you,<WH6965> and will establish my covenant with you.<WH1285>
You shall eat<WH398> old store<WH3462> long kept,<WH3318> and you shall move out the old<WH3465> because<WH6440> of the new.<WH2319>
I will set<WH5414> my tent<WH4908> among<WH8432> you:<WH5315> and my soul won't<WH1602> abhor you.
I will walk<WH1980> among<WH8432> you,<WH1961> and will be your God,<WH430> and you will be<WH1961> my people.<WH5971>

I am Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who brought you forth<WH3318> out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> that you should not be their slaves;<WH5650> and I have broken<WH7665> the bars of your yoke,<WH5923> and made you go<WH3212> upright.<WH6968>
<WH8085>"'But if you will not listen to me,<WH6213> and will not do all these commandments;<WH4687>

and if you shall reject<WH3988> my statutes,<WH2708> and if your soul<WH5315> abhors<WH1602> my ordinances,<WH4941> so that you will not do<WH6213> all my commandments,<WH4687> but break<WH6565> my covenant;<WH1285>

I also will do<WH6213> this to you:<WH6485> I will appoint terror<WH928> over you,<WH7829> even consumption and fever,<WH6920> that shall consume<WH3615> the eyes,<WH5869> and make the soul<WH5315> to pine<WH1727> away;<WH2232> and you will sow your seed<WH2233> in vain,<WH7385> for your enemies<WH341> will eat it.<WH398>

I will set<WH5414> my face<WH6440> against you,<WH5062> and you will be struck before<WH6440> your enemies.<WH341> Those who hate<WH8130> you will rule<WH7287> over you;<WH5127> and you will flee when no one pursues you.<WH7291>
<WH5704>"'If you in spite of these things will not listen<WH8085> to me,<WH3256> then I will chastise you seven times<WH7651> more<WH3254> for your sins.<WH2403>
I will break<WH7665> the pride<WH1347> of your power,<WH5797> and I will make<WH5414> your sky<WH8064> like iron,<WH1270> and your soil<WH776> like brass;<WH5154>

and your strength<WH3581> will be spent<WH8552> in vain;<WH7385> for your land<WH776> won't<WH5414> yield its increase,<WH2981> neither will the trees<WH6086> of the land<WH776> yield<WH5414> their fruit.<WH6529>
<WH3212>"'If you walk contrary<WH7147> to me,<WH8085> and won't listen to me,<WH14> then I will bring<WH3254> seven times<WH7651> more<WH3254> plagues<WH4347> on you according to your sins.<WH2403>

I will send<WH7971> the wild<WH7704> animals<WH2416> among you,<WH7921> which will rob you of your children, destroy<WH3772> your livestock,<WH929> and make you few in number;<WH4591> and your roads<WH1870> will become desolate.<WH8074>
<WH3256>"'If by these things you won't be reformed to me,<WH1980> but will walk contrary to me;<WH7147>
then I will also walk<WH1980> contrary<WH7147> to you;<WH5221> and I will strike you,<WH1571> even I,<WH7651> seven times for your sins.<WH2403>

I will bring<WH935> a sword<WH2719> upon you,<WH5359> that will execute the vengeance<WH5358> of the covenant;<WH1285> and you will be gathered together<WH622> within<WH413> your cities:<WH5892> and I will send<WH7971> the pestilence<WH1698> among<WH8432> you;<WH5414> and you will be delivered into the hand<WH3027> of the enemy.<WH341>

When I break<WH7665> your staff<WH4294> of bread,<WH3899> ten<WH6235> women<WH802> shall bake<WH644> your bread<WH3899> in one<WH259> oven,<WH8574> and they shall deliver<WH7725> your bread<WH3899> again<WH7725> by weight:<WH4948> and you shall eat,<WH398> and not be satisfied.<WH7646>
<WH2063>"'If you in spite of this won't<WH8085> listen to me,<WH1980> but walk contrary to me;<WH7147>
then I will walk<WH1980> contrary<WH7147> to you in wrath;<WH2534> and I also<WH637> will chastise<WH3256> you seven times<WH7651> for your sins.<WH2403>
You will eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of your sons,<WH1121> and you will eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of your daughters.<WH1323>

I will destroy<WH8045> your high places,<WH1116> and cut down<WH3772> your incense altars,<WH2553> and cast<WH5414> your dead bodies<WH6297> upon the bodies<WH6297> of your idols;<WH1544> and my soul<WH5315> will abhor you.<WH1602>

I will lay<WH5414> your cities<WH5892> waste,<WH2723> and will bring<WH8074> your sanctuaries<WH4720> to desolation,<WH8074> and I will not take delight<WH7306> in the sweet fragrance<WH7381> of your offerings.<WH5207>
I will bring<WH8074> the land<WH776> into desolation;<WH8074> and your enemies<WH341> that dwell<WH3427> therein will be astonished at it.<WH8074>

I will scatter<WH2219> you among the nations,<WH1471> and I will draw out<WH7324> the sword<WH2719> after<WH310> you:<WH776> and your land will be a desolation,<WH8077> and your cities<WH5892> shall be a waste.<WH2723>

Then the land<WH776> will enjoy<WH7521> its sabbaths<WH7676> as long<WH3117> as it lies desolate<WH8074> and you are in your enemies<WH341>' land.<WH776> Even then the land<WH776> will rest<WH7673> and enjoy<WH7521> its sabbaths.<WH7676>
As long as<WH3117> it lies desolate<WH8074> it shall have rest,<WH7673> even the rest<WH7673> which it didn't<WH7676> have in your sabbaths, when you lived on it.<WH3427>

<WH7604>"'As for those of you who are left, I will send<WH935> a faintness<WH4816> into their hearts<WH3824> in the lands<WH776> of their enemies:<WH341> and the sound<WH6963> of a driven<WH5086> leaf<WH5929> will put them to flight;<WH7291> and they shall flee,<WH5127> as one flees<WH5127> from the sword;<WH2719> and they will fall<WH5307> when no one pursues.<WH7291>

They will stumble<WH3782> over one<WH376> another,<WH251> as it were before<WH6440> the sword,<WH2719> when no one pursues:<WH7291> and you will have no power to stand<WH8617> before<WH6440> your enemies.<WH341>
You will perish<WH6> among the nations,<WH1471> and the land<WH776> of your enemies<WH341> will eat you up.<WH398>

Those of you who are left<WH7604> will pine away<WH4743> in their iniquity<WH5771> in your enemies<WH341>' lands;<WH776> and also in the iniquities<WH5771> of their fathers<WH1> shall they pine away with them.<WH4743>

<WH3034>"'If they confess their iniquity,<WH5771> and the iniquity<WH5771> of their fathers,<WH1> in their trespass<WH4604> which they trespassed<WH4603> against me,<WH1980> and also that, because they walked contrary to me,<WH7147>

I also walked<WH3212> contrary<WH7147> to them,<WH935> and brought them into the land<WH776> of their enemies:<WH341> if then<WH176> their uncircumcised<WH6189> heart<WH3824> is humbled,<WH3665> and they then accept<WH7521> the punishment of their iniquity;<WH5771>

then I will remember<WH2142> my covenant<WH1285> with Jacob;<WH3290> and also my covenant<WH1285> with Isaac,<WH3327> and also my covenant<WH1285> with Abraham;<WH85> and I will remember<WH2142> the land.<WH776>

The land<WH776> also will be left<WH5800> by them,<WH7521> and will enjoy its sabbaths<WH7676> while it lies desolate<WH8074> without them:<WH7521> and they will accept the punishment of their iniquity;<WH5771> because,<WH3282> even because<WH3282> they rejected<WH3988> my ordinances,<WH4941> and their soul<WH5315> abhorred<WH1602> my statutes.<WH2708>

Yet<WH637> for all that,<WH2063> when they are<WH1571> in the land<WH776> of their enemies,<WH341> I will not reject<WH3988> them,<WH1602> neither will I abhor them,<WH3615> to destroy them utterly, and to break<WH6565> my covenant<WH1285> with them;<WH3068> for I am Yahweh their God;<WH430>

but I will for their sake remember<WH2142> the covenant<WH1285> of their ancestors,<WH7223> whom I brought out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> in the sight<WH5869> of the nations,<WH1471> that I might be their God.<WH430> I am Yahweh.<WH3068>'"

These are the statutes,<WH2706> ordinances<WH4941> and laws,<WH8451> which Yahweh<WH3068> made<WH5414> between him and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> in Mount<WH2022> Sinai<WH5514> by<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>
